verses.text: Loudly will \w I|strong="H5921"\w* lift \w my|strong="H5921"\w* cry \w to|strong="H5921"\w* God, loudly \w to|strong="H5921"\w* God, \w so|strong="H5921"\w* \w he|strong="H5921"\w* hears \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w In|strong="H6963"\w* \w the|strong="H6963"\w* day \w of|strong="H6963"\w* \w my|strong="H6963"\w* trouble \w I|strong="H6963"\w* seek \w the|strong="H6963"\w* \nd Lord\nd*; \w in|strong="H6963"\w* \w the|strong="H6963"\w* night \w I|strong="H6963"\w* lift \w my|strong="H6963"\w* hands \w in|strong="H6963"\w* prayer, refusing \w all|strong="H6817"\w* comfort.

\w When|strong="H3117"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w think|strong="H5162"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w*, \w I|strong="H3117"\w* moan; \w when|strong="H3117"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* muse, \w my|strong="H3027"\w* \w spirit|strong="H5315"\w* \w is|strong="H5315"\w* faint. \qs Selah\qs*

\w When|strong="H2142"\w* \w you|strong="H2142"\w* \w hold|strong="H2142"\w* \w my|strong="H2142"\w* eyes awake, \w and|strong="H7307"\w* \w I|strong="H7878"\w* am restless \w and|strong="H7307"\w* speechless,

\w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w think|strong="H5869"\w* \w of|strong="H5869"\w* \w the|strong="H1696"\w* days \w of|strong="H5869"\w* old, call \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w mind|strong="H3808"\w* distant years.

\w I|strong="H3117"\w* commune \w with|strong="H3117"\w* \w my|strong="H2803"\w* heart \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* night, \w I|strong="H3117"\w* muse \w with|strong="H3117"\w* inquiring spirit.

‘\w Will|strong="H7307"\w* \w the|strong="H2142"\w* \nd Lord\nd* cast \w us|strong="H2142"\w* \w off|strong="H5973"\w* forever, \w will|strong="H7307"\w* \w he|strong="H7307"\w* \w be|strong="H7307"\w* gracious no more?
Has \w his|strong="H3808"\w* love vanished \w forever|strong="H5769"\w*? \w Is|strong="H3808"\w* \w his|strong="H3808"\w* faithfulness utterly \w gone|strong="H3808"\w*?
\w Has|strong="H5331"\w* God forgotten \w to|strong="H1755"\w* \w be|strong="H5331"\w* gracious, or \w in|strong="H1755"\w* anger withheld his compassion?’ \qs Selah\qs*
Then I said, ‘This it is that grieves \w me|strong="H7911"\w*, that \w the|strong="H7911"\w* hand of \w the|strong="H7911"\w* Most High has changed.’

\w I|strong="H8141"\w* \w will|strong="H1931"\w* think \w of|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H8141"\w* deeds \w of|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H8141"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3225"\+w*\nd*, \w and|strong="H8141"\w* remember \w your|strong="H2470"\w* wonders \w of|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H8141"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3588"\w* muse \w on|strong="H6924"\w* all \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* wrought, \w and|strong="H2142"\w* meditate \w on|strong="H6924"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* \w deeds|strong="H4611"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H3605"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w way|strong="H3605"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God, \w was|strong="H3605"\w* majestic: \w what|strong="H6467"\w* God \w was|strong="H3605"\w* great \w as|strong="H3605"\w* \w our|strong="H3605"\w* God?

\w You|strong="H1870"\w* \w were|strong="H1419"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H4310"\w* \w who|strong="H4310"\w* did marvels, \w you|strong="H1870"\w* did show \w your|strong="H1870"\w* power \w to|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H1870"\w* world

\w by|strong="H6213"\w* \w your|strong="H3045"\w* arm \w you|strong="H6213"\w* rescued \w your|strong="H3045"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w the|strong="H6213"\w* children \w of|strong="H5971"\w* Jacob \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H5971"\w*. \qs Selah\qs*

\w The|strong="H1121"\w* waters \w saw|strong="H3290"\w* \w you|strong="H5971"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God. \w The|strong="H1121"\w* waters \w saw|strong="H3290"\w* \w you|strong="H5971"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* shivered; \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H3290"\w* depths \w they|strong="H5971"\w* trembled.

Clouds poured torrents \w of|strong="H4325"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*, thunder rolled \w in|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* sky, \w your|strong="H7200"\w* arrows sped \w to|strong="H4325"\w* \w and|strong="H7200"\w* fro.

Loud \w was|strong="H6963"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* roll \w of|strong="H6963"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* \w thunder|strong="H6963"\w*, lightnings lit \w up|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* world. Earth quaked \w and|strong="H1980"\w* trembled.

\w In|strong="H6963"\w* your way, \nd Lord\nd*, \w through|strong="H6963"\w* \w the|strong="H6963"\w* sea, \w in|strong="H6963"\w* your path \w through|strong="H6963"\w* \w the|strong="H6963"\w* mighty waters, your footsteps \w were|strong="H8398"\w* \w all|strong="H7493"\w* unseen.

\w You|strong="H3045"\w* \w did|strong="H3808"\w* guide \w your|strong="H3045"\w* folk \w like|strong="H1870"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* flock \w by|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H3045"\w* hand \w of|strong="H1870"\w* \w Moses|strong="H3808"\w* \w and|strong="H1870"\w* Aaron.
